creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: 2 women at L, one holding a baby, in front of a wall of windows (or paintings?); wall at L with rounded steps up to a doorway; other structures in background center
inscription:
Inscription

at bottom edge, in black ink: [luogo degli espositi alla Pieta]
medium: Pen and brown ink over black chalk
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: City Street in Genoa, with the Lighthouse and Port in the Background
